hypothesis_content.title: Wall Street Forecast Trim -> Contrarian Sentiment Squeeze
hypothesis_content.statement: Wall Street trimming BTC price forecasts (as per news) creates overly pessimistic sentiment, which will be violently corrected by a +4% BTC rally within 72 hours if spot price holds above the 20-day moving average during the negative news flow.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Institutional forecast trims are often lagging indicators. When combined with negative retail sentiment (F&G drop) and negative funding (crowded shorts), the setup is primed for a short squeeze. The catalyst (negative news) amplifies the misalignment, creating a high-probability mean reversion if technical structure (20-day SMA) holds.
entry_conditions: BTC spot price > 20-day simple moving average
Aggregated Crypto Fear & Greed Index drops by ≥8 points in 24h on negative Wall Street forecast news
BTC perpetual funding rate turns negative (shorts paying longs)
Spot CVD (Cumulative Volume Delta) on 1h timeframe turns positive while price is flat or down (smart money accumulation)
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Price breaks and sustains below 20-day SMA without a squeeze, OR negative funding persists without a rally for >72h.
